scripts.validate_downloads: ajv -d sample_data/blanko.json -s src/schema/charsheet.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json &&  ajv -d sample_data/spiderman.json -s src/schema/charsheet.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json &&  ajv -d sample_data/blobo.json -s src/schema/charsheet.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json &&  ajv -d sample_data/american_eagle.json -s src/schema/charsheet.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json
